parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular

str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular

str2: To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 1st Person Singular

str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
From pleroo; repletion or completion, i.e. what fills, or what is filled.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
